item.title: Jumping to multiple hosts with ssh behind a gateway
item.description: At home I have several hosts that I need to ssh into at various times. Unfortunately, since IPv6 is widely deployed, I am stuck sshing into one host that is publically accessible, and from there sshing into other hosts. Cumbersome to say the least, but it does look cool when â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
